INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the plasma concentrations of carbamazepine with signs of overdose
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Clinical monitoring, testing of the plasma concentrations of carbamazepine, and possible reduction of the dosage of the carbamazepine during the treatment with the serotoninergic antidepressant and after it is stopped.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of increase of the undesirable effects of the mequitazine, due to inhibition of its metabolism by the enzymatic inhibitor
Risk of increase of the undesirable effects of the metoprolol, especially with excessive bradycardia, due to inhibition of its metabolism by the fluoxetine.
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Increased clinical monitoring, if needed, adjustment of the dosage of themetoprolol during the length of the treatment with the fluoxetine and after it is stopped.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of increase of the undesirable effects of the nebivolol, especially with excessive bradycardia, due to inhibition of its metabolism by the antidepressant
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Increased clinical monitoring; if needed, adjustment of the dosage of the nebivolol during the length of the treatment with the antidepressant and after it is stopped.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the plasma concentrations of phenytoin with signs of overdose, due to inhibition of the metabolism of the phenytoin
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Clinical monitoring and possibly testing of the plasma concentrations of phenytoin. If needed, adjustment of the dosage during the treatment with the fluoxetine and after it is stopped.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the active fraction of the risperidone due to decrease of its hepatic metabolism by the fluoxetine, with risk of increase of its undesirable effects
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Clinical monitoring, and, if needed, adjustment of the dosage of the risperidone.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Reduction of the effectiveness of the tamoxifen, due to inhibition of the formation of its active metabolite by the fluoxetine.
Risk of increase of the undesirable effects of the vortioxetine due to decrease of its hepatic metabolism
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Clinical monitoring and possible adjustment of the dosage of the vortioxetine during the treatment with fluoxetine and after it is stopped.
